name: Attack of The Zeta Meat
description:
DB Date 100 AB:

After returning from New Las Vegas on Mars to Lunar orbit the bus was attacked by the Zeta Meat.

The Zeta Meat incident resulted in sentient meat species that took over the earth after humans colonized space.

The first attack left the bus partially incapacitated and can only fight the threat by warping through the enemies and their missiles. Luckily the bus absorbs some energy from shifting through objects. This seems to power the warp engine slightly longer than usual.
